cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Cooling begins with 1 and
ends with 2.
cards.answer:
1. injection
2. demolding

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: When does the shrinkage of the polymer occur?
cards.answer: During cooling down.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Which point during the injection phase is of high importance and what
happens if the timing isn't right?
cards.answer:
Switching point from
compression to holding
pressure
When switching too early -> volume of the part is too low
-> sink marks are visible on surface

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: When is the injection phase finished?
cards.answer: When the gate freezes.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Name the 3 phases of the injection stage and marked point at the
end of the curve.
[Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-09_um_09.13.16.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T191809Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=95f27e8459de1c0a49591e511004bac6d3d7ea9524bb7ab5c858e14be3d8e9cf

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name the 3 stages of the melt flow.
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-09_um_09.06.23.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T191809Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=e0b8a45d1e6a199f2f50a09a074cfb610034ff4ae610baa831eac824bf9a5f92

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
The maximum injection pressure is a 1
paramater and an 2
limit for the variable during
injection stage.
cards.answer:
1. prefixed
2. upper

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What happens during the injection?
cards.answer:
Screw moves forward without rotating
injection of the metered material through the nozzle into the
mold

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What has to be adjusted for each new molding process?
cards.answer: Back pressure and metering stroke

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What defines the metering volume and how is it called?
cards.answer:
Screw position / screw backward travel
Name: Feeding / metering stroke

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: The back pressure during the metering phase is ______.
cards.answer: adjustable

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: How does back pressure affect the melt?
cards.answer:
Better homogenization
Improved dissipation heating

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What causes the back pressure during metering?
cards.answer: Conglomerated melt at screw tip.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Why does the screw move backward during metering?
cards.answer:
Melt accumulates at screw tip
pressure builds up

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What happens to the material in the plasticizing cylinder
during metering?
cards.answer:
It gets
conveyed
densified
melted

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name the 7 steps of the Injection Molding Process.
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-09_um_08.51.15.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T191809Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=a5113c74202e034f1590a02a1d0277e76192eb21df4cdf3d113ae90bd1830489

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: When and why is cooling of the mold helpful?
cards.answer:
For molding parts with complicated geometry, different cooling rates
can avoid warpage of the whole part.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What mediums are chosen as a cooling fluid in mold plates?
cards.answer: water or oil

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is important if you use more than one cavity in a runner system?
cards.answer:
Each cavity has to fill at the same time
Melt has to have the same pressure and temperature when entering
cavity

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
How can you improve the efficiency of an injection mold process and
how is it achieved?
cards.answer:
By using more than one cavity per mold
Main runner channel coming from the nozzle splits into several
channels

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is the price range for an injection molding tool?

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What tasks do the elements of a mold fulfill?
cards.answer:
• Melt intake and spreading
• Drawing of the pattern
• Quenching of the melt
• Demolding

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name the 4 elements a mold generally consists of.
cards.answer:
• Plate with cavity
• Runner system
• Heating system
• Ejector system

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Which distance on a machine limits the size of a mold?
cards.answer: The distance between the adjacent tie bars.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name at least 3 advantages of a fully electric clamping unit.
cards.answer:
• Higher precision due to fast reaction times of the
electro-mechanical drives
• Energy saving by higher efficiency
• Low maintenance of electro-mechanical drives
• High reproducibility by direct mechanical connection of motors
and axes
• Higher output due to parallel operation mode
• No use of hydraulic oil results in cleaner production

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is an advantage/disadvantage of hydraulic clamping units?
cards.answer:
advantage:
no tie bar breakage
cost-saving design due to fewer flexible parts and less
maintenance
higher precision
variable positioning
no unacceptable mold deformation
disadvantages:
Slower clamping speed
Oil compression → lower stiffness
High energy demand
Oil leakage risk
Higher system complexity (hydraulics)

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Which clamping system is faster?
cards.answer: toggle clamping system

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is an advantage/disadvantage of toggle clamping units?
cards.answer:
advantage:
self locking -> no energy requirement to keep the mold closed
disadvantage:
permanent deformation of the mold after poor adjustment of the
toggle and the high maintenance due to many moving parts

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
For which machine sizes are hydraulically driven toggles (Kniehebel)
normally used?
cards.answer: smaller and medium sized machines

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name the 3 common clamping systems.
cards.answer:
• Toggle Clamping unit (electrically or hydraulically driven)
• Fully hydraulic clamping unit or
• Fully electrical clamping unit

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Which component holds back the injected polymer?
cards.answer: Non-return valve

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: How does the plasticizing take place in the screw?
cards.answer: by internal friction and heat supply by heating tapes

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name the 3 sections of a common injection molding screw.
cards.answer:
• Feed section
• Compression section
• Metering section

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What are the most important elements of the plasticizing unit to
realize the tasks?
cards.answer:
• Hopper
• Screw in heated barrel
• Drive system
• Non-return valve
• Nozzle

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Name at least 3 main procedural tasks performed by the plasticizing
unit.
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-07_um_17.05.35.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T191815Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=de705f2632e6d75b89b083ec95ba8916993f9799e3303ec1a4eb37c39d2efa2c

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name the parts that make up an Injection Molding Machine.
cards.answer:
Injection molding machines consist of following component
assemblies:
• Plasticizing unit
• Clamping unit
• Measurement and control unit
• Machine bed
• Mold
• Temperature control for the mold
Mold and temperature control do not belong directly to the
machine setup.
[Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-07_um_17.04.54.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T191815Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=fe71e3d74a8a9f2a90d722c69846706dd961a9d5483b59cbe301223a106521dd

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: How is the task for a Injection Molding Machine defined?
cards.answer:
Discontinuous production of molding from primarily macromolecular
substances, whereas primary shaping is performed under pressure.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name at least 3 characteristics of injection molding.
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-07_um_17.02.07.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T191815Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=ab77bdca37c8e61f65baa7c02dd7af4f87c140ef45e383d10e06ccb7a4ac8e7b

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: How is the mathematical connection between cycle and cooling time?
cards.answer:
The cooling time (tcool) increases proportionally with
the wall thickness (dwall) in second power.
tcool = C
• dwall2
C: Proportionality constant
depending on material and process conditions

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What measurement is crucial for productivity and on which part of
the process does it depend on?
cards.answer: The cycle time; depends particularly on the cooling time

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What happens in this step?
[Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-07_um_16.58.52.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T192145Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=93bd1a581b21b9078249a68217a97a3bb48c9da065c6ccb919d2720e7b01df74
cards.answer:
The ejectors demold the frozen part from the open
mold
the screw conveys new material to the screw tip
the injection unit moves backward

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What happens in this step?
[Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-07_um_16.58.22.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T192145Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=04b90b727583930cbcafaaf030a6828f00abfd9eef4831d95289c17fb408410f
cards.answer:
The mold closes
the injection unit moves forward to the sprue bush
the screw presses the molten polymer like a piston
into the mold ➡️Injection

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What happens in this step?
[Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-07_um_16.57.58.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T192145Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=2f9b90706a46551869effc32af4d090849d477241ba32598eec2b163d31c8853
cards.answer:
The rotating screw conveys the granulate from the feed hopper
through the screw channels to the screw tip

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What are the 3 main steps of the process?
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-07_um_16.57.36.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T192145Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=563b98efd6d23b16e41a0689ed13b2c116718f405abf5630e1ffe1efc90ca959

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What are 2 main advantages of Injection Molding?
cards.answer:
minor further treatment of parts
ability to produce parts with complex geometry

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is the weight ratio of parts that can be produced?
cards.answer: less than 1mg to more than 100kg

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
How high is the percentage of injection molding machines of all
produced plastics and why?
cards.answer:
about 60%
Injection Molding is a very important processing strategy for
thermoplastics

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Name at least 4 criteria for a
mold design.
cards.answer:
Component design suitable for plastics
Determination of the plastic type
Determination of the mold design:
Number of cavities
Injection points
Shrinkage
Definition of the melt distribution system:
Cold runner
Hot runner
Venting of the cavities
Ejection of the component from the cavity
Cooling/tempering (circuits/ cooling holes)
Thermal expansion of the mold

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Why does a mold need to be heated?
cards.answer:
Depending on the used material the crystallization temperature is so
high (160°C)

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Name the components of an injection mold.
[Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-06_um_17.12.13.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T192145Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=0ed27ee993f29d37489bfac554ddf84ecc4af1f0d91c48485baaa649da302d72
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-06_um_17.12.40.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T192145Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=58bd36aa598203d2ffa23f1fa4241ec381bebe1678c428c663a6ab7c30eed243

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Which two halves form the cavity?
cards.answer:
Female mold half = cavity
Male mold half = core.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is an injection mold, and what is its purpose?
cards.answer:
Mold with one/more cavities
shape of desired product
produces plastic parts in large numbers, required quality,
dimensional accuracy, low cost.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What are the 3 main nozzle designs and which
one is the standard?
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-06_um_17.05.11.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T192145Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=86155b23fcec5d2e7692837b0b8e93206cce218567548fb600bba203dacdc8f3

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is the purpose of plasticizing unit nozzle?
cards.answer:
• The nozzle connects the injection unit to the
injection mold.
• The nozzle reduces the screw diameter to a few
millimeters

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What happens to the lock ring during injection?
cards.answer:
lock ring is pressed against pressure ring
screw flights are closed -> no backflow

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What happens to the lock ring during metering?
cards.answer:
It is ressed against screw tip during metering
creates gap between the lock ring and pressure ring
melt flows through gap

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What do lock ring and pressure ring do together with the screw
tip?
cards.answer: Act as a stop for the melt

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Which three parts make up the non‑return valve?
cards.answer:
Screw tip
lock ring
pressure ring

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Where is the non‑return valve located?
cards.answer: At the tip of the metering screw.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is the main function of the non‑return valve?
cards.answer: Prevent melt backflow; the screw acts as a piston.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Name the 3 zones of an universal
screw and describe their
task.
cards.answer:
feed zone: rear end of the screw with the
greatest flight depth, used for conveying
compression zone: transition from the feed zone
to the discharge zone with increasing core thickness and
decreasing flight depth, also transition zone
discharge zone / metering: front part of the
screw with the lowest flight depth, also discharge or metering
zone

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What are disadvantages of a screw
unit?
cards.answer:
Effective screw length is shortened during plasticizing (limited
metering stroke, inhomogeneous T-distribution)
Non-return valves (NRV) are required

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What are advantages of a screw
unit?
cards.answer:
Less installation space required
Short residence time
Screw serves two functions
plasticizing (rotation)
Injection as piston

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is a screw unit?
cards.answer: Screw or screw piston injection molding machine

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
In a preplasticizing + injection piston unit,
how are plasticizing and
injection arranged and which components perform
each function?
cards.answer:
• Plasticizing and injection are spatially separated
• Plasticizing with a single-screw extruder
• Injection via an injection piston

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Name disadvantages of a
preplasticizing + injection piston system in
injection molding.
cards.answer:
• High construction effort
• Valves susceptible to maintenance
• High manufacturing costs

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What are advantages of a preplasticizing + injection
piston system in injection molding?
cards.answer:
• Consistent plasticizing quality
• High injection speeds

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Define Sealing Point.
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-06_um_14.51.24.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T192146Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=58f7199d70be8b79f7194926a4beb2da10cb800a085dac9ba1f2a1afe9bca2bc

cards.question: Define Switchover point.
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-06_um_14.50.04.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T192146Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=ac46f3551af74ede9879034b73c1285c96ed9987d69eecd08befc1b0e8a23a07

cards.question: Define Injection.
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-06_um_14.49.46.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T192146Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=4357b2bb4e40a55a6fc142ece08cc519dc93c0be49c031adf022207c2a839473

cards.question: Define Screw Peripheral Speed.
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-06_um_14.47.35.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T192146Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=d7f782792d8c21b1469a7315387d9b5bd0437f1eac790e21d450e58cceb4ecb0

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What is the task of the Plasticizing Unit and how is
it classified?
cards.answer:
It injects the melt into the closed mold at high speed and,
respectively, high pressure
classified according to its injection performance, which is
calculated from injection volume multiplied by max. injection
pressure.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Which components does the Plasticizing-Unit comprise
and what are their tasks?
cards.answer:
Components:
heated barrel
screw drive
hydraulics for moving the screw
Tasks:
plasticizing of the injection material
metering of the compound
the application of injection and
holding pressure

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Name advantages/disadvantages of a tie-bar-less closing
unit.
cards.answer:
disadvantage: very stiff (-> thick) plates
are needed to counteract missing tie bars

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Name advantage/disadvantage of a closing unit with
Knee Lever
cards.answer:
+ no constant
hydraulic pressure: unit is closed purely
mechanically → energy efficient
- more moving
parts for mechanism

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What are the requirements of a Closing Unit?
cards.answer:
must accommodate the injection mold
enable closing / opening movement of the mold halves
apply the closing and clamping force

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Which components are a part of the Closing Unit?
cards.answer:
fixed and moving plate for the mold
the face plate (rear bearing of the closing unit)
tie bars
drive of the moving mold plate
[Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-06_um_13.31.44.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T192146Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=aadba1319f9aab04c3300acaec8e90b356868d9743436a8cf07e5dd314dc66bf

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Why is the cooling time in the process relatively long?
cards.answer:
high heat capacity of plastic
low thermal conductivity → takes long until heat gets out of
part

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Which steps (number and name) of the Injection Molding Cycle are for
cooling the molding part?
cards.answer:
4. Pack & hold
5. Screw backward
6. Melt plasticizing

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
How many steps does the Injection Molding
Process consist off and what are there
names?
cards.answer:
Mold close
Screw forward
Injection
Pack & hold
Screw backward
Melt plasticizing
Mold open, ejection

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What is a goal that you aim for regarding the
wall thickness of a Injection Molding part and
why is that?
cards.answer:
Uniform wall thickness for one part to avoid
different cooling times (thicker - longer | thinner - short)
which would lead to
internal stresses
warpage
sink marks
uneven flow resistance → incomplete filling, weld lines,
quality variations

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
The Injection Molding Cycle is
process.
cards.answer: discontinuous
